20101221023607.000|20101221023608.000|CC1|SWARMING ON ADDRESSES IN FOUR

20101221024356.000|20101221024358.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101221024358.000|20101221024400.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101221024400.000|20101221024400.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101221024400.000|20101221024403.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101221024403.000|20101221024404.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101221024404.000|20101221024404.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101221024404.000|20101221024407.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101221024407.000|20101221024407.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101221024407.000|20101221024410.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101221024410.000|20101221024410.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101221024410.000|20101221024412.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101221024412.000|20101221024412.000|CC1|        working together        
20101221024412.000|20101221024414.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101221024414.000|20101221024414.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101221024414.000|20101221024417.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101221024417.000|20101221024417.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101221024417.000|20101221024419.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101221024419.000|20101221024421.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101221024421.000|20101221024421.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101221024421.000|20101221024423.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101221024423.000|20101221024423.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101221024423.000|20101221024425.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101221024425.000|20101221024427.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.

20101221024428.000|20101221024431.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.
